entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kimmirut
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:33 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -33.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kimmirut Airport 10:07 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -33.3°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -44
Dewpoint: -37.5°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 36 this afternoon.
